verbs.description: [ARG0: I] [ARGM-ADV: mostly] [V: see] [ARG1: Sen. Ron Wyden in local news videos grilling , embarrassing and berating some poor schmuck from the other political party at some obscure U.S. Senate hearing . Or , glad - handing some friendly constituent at one of his oft - touted Oregon town hall meetings . Sen. Jeff Merkley recently made news by flying] to a Brownsville , Texas immigration detention center unannounced -- at taxpayer expense , I assume -- to score some pro - immigration fundraising footage for his next senatorial campaign -- or , perhaps a future presidential run ? He needed an appointment and left without gaining entry or answers , but he sure looked rambunctious doing it . Current immigration law is apparently being enforced in Texas . If Merkley is n't happy with that , he should introduce legislation to change it . Just because a mid - term election is imminent , how does it help Oregonians when our senators spend the first two years of President Donald Trump 's administration disengaged from the nation 's business , and unable or unwilling to advance creative and reasonable ideas that might get traction with the other side ? Our political system is broken . Being a senator is about leadership and engagement , not histrionics and self - promotion . Who 's the " Party of No " now ? Greg Chase , Northwest Portland

He needed an appointment and left without gaining entry or answers , but he sure looked rambunctious doing it . Current immigration law is apparently being enforced in Texas . If Merkley is n't happy with that , he should introduce legislation to change it . Just because a mid - term election is imminent , how does it help Oregonians when [ARG0: our senators] spend the first two years of President Donald Trump 's administration disengaged from the nation 's business , and unable or unwilling to [V: advance] [ARG1: creative and reasonable ideas that might get traction with the other side] ? Our political system is broken . Being a senator is about leadership and engagement , not histrionics and self - promotion . Who 's the " Party of No " now ? Greg Chase , Northwest Portland
